string.text: Cartridge with buckshot charge. Application range up to 25 meters. It is used for firing from the KS-23 carbine. Due to the fact that the barrel has rifling in the KS-23 carbine, the buckshot flies over a large area, which allows you to shoot offhand, practically without aiming.\n
A cartridge with a steel pointed bullet. It is used to forcibly stop vehicles by damaging them. Application range up to 100 meters. It is used for firing from the KS-23 carbine.\n

Special carbine, 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: The long 700mm barrel can be replaced by short 510mm one to decrease the weight of the weapon.

Shortened version of KS-23 with removable metal stock. 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: Boar Tactical Kit for KS-23M Drozd.

Shortened version with mounted Trijicon RMR reflex sight. 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery. Also this version has thread for sound suppressor that can be found somewere at south locations of Zone.\n %c[ui_gray_2]ATTACHMENTS: \n %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Silencer: KZRZP suppressor

Special carbine, 23 mm - Soviet multi-functional police pump-action shotgun, designed to suppress riots, selective force, mental and chemical effects on offenders. Interestingly, having a caliber of more than 20 mm and a rifled barrel, the KS-23 should not be classified as small arms, but as small-caliber artillery. This modification of KS-23 has short 510mm barrel installed on it instead of standard long 700mm one.\n

%c[ui_gray_1]Short and light barrel for KS-23 Carabine. This upgrade is irreversible. 
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] KS-23 Carabine

%c[ui_gray_1]The kit includes: Threaded barrel for using with suppressor and Trijicon RMR sight with mounting module. This upgrade is irreversible.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Carabine KS-23M Drozd
